name: Invitation to a tea party -pocket mirror
description:
This is a reproduction of the painting "invitation to a tea party"
A tiny piece of art you can carry with you
or a unique gift for a friend.

This is a (56cm) 2 1/4 inches hand pressed pocket mirror and will come with an organza pouch ,you can use for safe keeping.

The mirror is packed safely and shipped on first priority mail
Note: all the prints are available in pocket mirrors if you see something you like but it's not listed please contact me.

for more info or other questions just contact me or hop over to my blog :
http://www.kissthefrogboutique.typepad.com/
for news ,contests and other fun stuff.

♥ ♥ Pocket mirrors are great for gifts, party favors and wedding favors.For prices on any of these please contact me with the design you'd like (or the designs)and the quantity you'd like to order.♥ ♥
